ygData.subject: How to get IP address in a Filter
ygData.msgSnippet: I developed a filter to limit crawl to ranges of ip addresses. In 1.2.0, there s a member function getServer() in class CrawURI, so I can get IP address by

I developed a filter to limit crawl to ranges of ip addresses. In 
1.2.0, there's a member function getServer() in class CrawURI, so I 
can get IP address by ((CrawlURI)o).getServer().getHost().getIP() .

But, in 1.3.0 there's no such function. How can I do this?


thanks
